title: Part 4831 - Appeals to the Commission
content:
Part 4831 - Appeals to the Commission

§ 4831.2 - Contents of notice
§ 4831.3 - Forwarding of original notice to commission
§ 4831.4 - Filing of statement of appeal
§ 4831.5 - Contents of statement
§ 4831.6 - Content and filing of counterstatement
§ 4831.7 - Proofs annexed to counterstatement
§ 4831.8 - How papers may be filed
§ 4831.9 - Notice of hearing
§ 4831.10 - Cross-examination of affiant
§ 4831.11 - Additional testimony may be allowed
§ 4831.12 - Subpoenas

§ 4831.14 - Adjournment of hearing

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
